scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build/development && mkdir build/development && mkdir build/development/css && mkdir build/development/js
scripts.build: npm run build:coffee && npm run build:jade && npm run build:stylus
scripts.build:coffee: browserify src/index.coffee --outfile build/development/js/main.js --transform coffeeify --extension=".coffee" --transform jadeify --extension=".jade" --require lodash
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch:jade" "npm run watch:stylus" "npm run watch:coffee"
scripts.watch:coffee: watchify src/index.coffee --outfile build/development/js/main.js --transform coffeeify --extension=".coffee" --transform jadeify --extension=".jade" --require lodash -v
